prompt:
How can I make a more engaging and dynamic resume?
To create a more engaging and dynamic resume, try to use strong verbs that describe your accomplishments and experiences. Use action words like "led", "created", "improved", or "innovated" instead of passive language. Make sure that you highlight specific details about what you did in each job position. Try to use keywords related to the job description so that hiring managers can quickly understand the relevance of your experience. Also, make sure that your resume is visually appealing with clear headings and proper formatting.
